msbt.message: This is it! Today is Halloween! I'm so excited! I can't stop shaking!I also MIGHT have had a bit TOO much candy a bit TOO early in the day, .

It's finally Halloween! A day for spooky surprises Ghosts and ghouls could appear at any second!I mean, they'd better. I want backup dancers for tonight, and there's a lot of tricky choreography to memorize!
AAH! I can't wait till tonight! I'm calling it early. This year, everyone's a Hallo-WINNER!
♪ Trick or treat! Smell my feet! Let's lay down some spooky beats! ♪ Then we all beatbox till dawn.That's my idea for a new Halloween tradition! I think it's going to be a hit tonight, .
Is your costume done yet? Mine is! I totally outdid myself this year. Heh heh. Take that, me!

The big event! It's almost here! The window for last-minute prep is closing fast, .Whatever you do, don't forget the c-a-n-d-y. You'll be MEGA pranked if you don't keep candy handy!I'm stocked up with tons of candy right here Le HUH?! My pocket has a hole in it! The candy fell out!My Halloween spirit is so powerful that I played a prank on MYSELF. I am AMAZING, !
Am I seeing thingsor are pumpkins popping up out of nowhere?Feels soHalloween-y! Yeah! I'm soakin' in gourd vibes!
You see it too, right? You see how Halloween is totally taking over all of ?Someone is going HARD on the decor! I just cannot believethat they wouldn't ask ME to help!
Look at all of this! These pumpkins are pumpin' this whole town up!It's like the entire island is being consumed by the very spirit of Halloweenwhich means My powers are WORKING! MWA HA HA HAAAA!

Pumpkins! Pumpkins everywhere! This. Is. Le. BEST.The lords of gourd have returned. They walk among us! Bow before the stumpy foot soldiers of fright!Gosh, I'm really going to miss having this excuse to be so loud and weird. Why can't Halloween last all year?
